奈.definition: used in expressions that convey frustration and futility, such as 無奈|无奈[wu2 nai4] and 莫可奈何|莫可奈何[mo4 ke3 nai4 he2] (literary); used for its phonetic value in writing foreign words

奈何.definition: to do something to sb; to deal with; to cope; how?; to no avail

奈曼.definition: Naiman banner or Naiman khoshuu in Tongliao 通遼|通辽[Tong1 liao2], Inner Mongolia

奈曼旗.definition: Naiman banner or Naiman khoshuu in Tongliao 通遼|通辽[Tong1 liao2], Inner Mongolia

奈秒.definition: nanosecond, ns, 10^-9 s (Tw); PRC equivalent: 納秒|纳秒[na4 miao3]

奈良.definition: Nara, an old capital of Japan

奈良時代.definition: Nara period (710-794) in early Japanese history
